patterns.observer

Observer pattern utilities.

Simple publish/subscribe helpers used for event notification in the game. Provides Subject to manage observers and several concrete observer implementations useful for HUD updates and debugging.

class patterns.observer.GameEventLogger(verbose=False)

Bases: Observer

Event logger useful for debugging; records recent events.

When verbose is True the logger will also print events to stdout.

get_recent_events(count=10)

Obtiene los últimos N eventos

update(event_type, data)

Recibe notificación de un evento

Parameters:

  • event_type (str) – Tipo de evento (‘points_changed’, ‘structure_built’, etc.)

  • data (Dict[str, Any]) – Datos relacionados con el evento

Return type:

None

class patterns.observer.Observer

Bases: ABC

Interface for observers that receive event notifications.

Implementations should provide an update(event_type, data) method.

abstractmethod update(event_type, data)

Recibe notificación de un evento

Parameters:

  • event_type (str) – Tipo de evento (‘points_changed’, ‘structure_built’, etc.)

  • data (Dict[str, Any]) – Datos relacionados con el evento

Return type:

None

class patterns.observer.PointsObserver(hud=None)

Bases: Observer

Observer that reacts to changes in player points.

Optionally shows HUD popups for significant gains.

Recibe notificación de un evento

Parameters:

  • data (Dict[str, Any]) – Datos relacionados con el evento

Return type:

None

class patterns.observer.StructureObserver

Bases: Observer

Observer that logs structure construction and destruction events.

class patterns.observer.Subject

Bases: object

Observable subject that keeps a registry of observers.

Observers can be attached per event type and will be notified when events are emitted via notify.

attach(event_type, observer)

Suscribe un observador a un tipo de evento específico

Parameters:

  • event_type (str)

  • observer (Observer)

Return type:

None

detach(event_type, observer)

Desuscribe un observador de un tipo de evento

Parameters:

  • event_type (str)

  • observer (Observer)

Return type:

None

notify(event_type, data=None)

Notifica a todos los observadores suscritos a este tipo de evento

Parameters:

  • event_type (str)

  • data (Dict[str, Any])

Return type:

None
